inclusion.criterion: Males greater than or equal to 18 years of age with histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage D0 disease with documented biochemical progression documented by a rising PSA.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of metastatic disease by physical examination, CT scan or bone scan.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Non-castrate level of testosterone: greater than or equal to 50 ng/dL (prior ADT allowed; must be greater than or equal to 6 months since last dose of ADT).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A Pre-Enrollment/Baseline PSADT > 3 months and less than or equal to 15 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have greater than or equal to 3 PSA measurements over greater than or equal to 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The interval between PSA measurements must be greater than or equal to 4 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy greater than or equal to 1 year.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin greater than or equal to 10.0 gm/dL, WBC greater than or equal to 2,500/mm(3), ALC greater than or equal to 500/mm3, ANC greater than or equal to 1,000/mm(3).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PT/PTT less than or equal to 1.5 times ULN unless receiving clinically indicated anticoagulant therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: SGOT/SGPT < 2.5 times ULN, total bilirubin < 1.5 times ULN, Cr < 1.5 times ULN, estimated GFR (eGFR) > 60 ml/min.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hepatitis B and C negative, unless the result is consistent with prior vaccination or prior infection with full recovery.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with an active second malignancy other than adequately treated squamous or basal cell carcinoma of the skin, or superficial bladder carcinoma.
exclusion.label: triggers
